elements.title: News(Top News : Rival political parties accept the parliamentary speaker's mediatory proposal on reform bills that would strip the prosecution of its investigative powers, but senior prosecutors quit en masse.) - 2022.04.22 PM5

News(Top News : The Democratic Party asks the parliamentary speaker to convene a plenary session on Friday, pushing ahead with reform bills that would strip the prosecution of its investigative authority.) - 2022.04.21 PM5
News(Top News : A Democratic Party lawmaker defects from the party in an attempt to help pass bills stripping the prosecution of their investigative powers.) - 2022.04.20 PM5
News(Top News : Rival parties hold a parliamentary committee meeting for the second day, discussing prosecution reform bills on investigative power.) - 2022.04.19 PM5
News(Top News : All social distancing measures are lifted amid a decline in new COVID-19 cases while the mask mandate remains in place.) - 2022.04.18 PM5
News(Top News : After more than two years, all social distancing restrictions will be lifted from Monday, except mandatory mask-wearing.) - 2022.04.15 PM5
News(Top News : President-elect Yoon Suk Yeol nominates his agriculture and labor minister picks, rounding out his first Cabinet lineup of 18 ministers.) - 2022.04.14 PM5
